company.title: Our Story
company.description:
Adroit Grow Private Limited founded by Mr. Manish Bhatnagar, a Civil Engineer with vast experience of 20+ years executing Industrial, Commercial & Interior Spaces. In his career, He has executed 150+ projects successfully with more than 70 Industrial projects in IMT Manesar itself.

With a deep knowledge of technical know-how of Civil, HVAC, Plumbing, Electrical, Solar, PEB Structures and farsightedness, he is an expert of Project Management of handling multiple projects at a time. He has done projects for a mix of clients including Japanese Multinationals, Indian Conglomerates, SMEs, Automobile ancillaries, Garment manufacturing Units, Plastic Injection Molding Factories, Engineering Industries and specialized in the Tire Industry.

Adroit Grow provides a single window one-stop solution to their customer with an emphasis on cost control & value additions by utilizing current Technologies & hands-on industrial experience.
highlights: 20+ years of industry expertise with 150+ projects completed
70+ Industrial projects in IMT Manesar alone
Specialized in Industrial greenfield projects from Concept Design to Productive stage
Single-window solution provider for end-to-end project delivery
Expertise in Civil, HVAC, Plumbing, Electrical, Solar, PEB Structures
